events.title: Ruby Red Cliff pillow from Eilersen Cushion's collection
events.content:
Sometimes the smallest changes make the biggest impact in your home. This stunning Ruby Red Cliff pillow from Eilersen Cushion's collection is proof that one beautiful accent piece can transform your entire space.
The rich, vibrant red combined with that gorgeous patchwork texture creates instant warmth and sophistication ‚Äì perfect for adding character to any room. Made with quality materials (57% Acrylic, 43% Polyester) and incredibly easy to maintain with just a damp cloth, it's as practical as it is beautiful.
What to love most? This design comes in several stunning colors including Rust Terracotta, Olive Green, White, and more. Ready to find your perfect match?

events.title: Eilersen Blaze cushion collection
events.content:
That cozy corner is calling your name! ‚ú®
Transform any space with the stunning Eilersen Blaze cushion collection - because your home deserves that perfect pop of personality.
These aren't just any throw pillows. The Blaze collection by Nils Juul Eilersen brings modern elegance with those gorgeous chevron patterns that instantly elevate your vibe. At 50x50cm, they're the perfect size to style solo or pair together (like we're obsessing over here! üòç).
What makes them special? Premium comfort meets easy living - crafted with 45% viscose, 35% cotton, and 20% polyester for that luxe texture that's also machine washable. Choose from Teal & Beige, Brown & Beige, Yellow & Beige, Green & Blue, or other colors to match your aesthetic.
